definition[0]: a piece of hospital equipment into which very small or weak babies are put to keep them alive and warm
definition[1]: a heated container for keeping eggs warm until they hatch (=the young birds are born)
definition[2]: an organization which helps new businesses to develop by giving them office space, services, and equipment, and providing them with business and technical advice
example[0]: a high-tech incubator on the east coast
definition[3]: a company or organization that provides help and support for new companies, especially ones using advanced technology or the Internet
example[1]: The government set up an Internet incubator.
